articles.author: Michael R. Gordon, Gordon Lubold, Nancy A. Youssef
articles.title: U.S., Allies Give Houthis Ultimatum: Stop Ship Attacks or Face Consequences - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: American military readies options to strike Iran-backed rebel group
articles.content:
WASHINGTONThe U.S., Britain and key allies issued what officials described as a final warning to the Houthi Yemeni rebel group Wednesday to cease 
its attacks on international shipping in the Red Se… [+459 chars]
